mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT A.RECORD_TYPE, D.DEPT_NAME, A.DR_NAME, A.CREATED_AT, A.TREATMENT_PERIOD, A.COST FROM DEPT D, (SELECT HM.DEPT_ID, HM.DR_NAME, R.RECORD_TYPE, R.COST, R.TREATMENT_PERIOD, R.CREATED_AT FROM HP_MEMBER HM, (SELECT DR_ID, RECORD_TYPE, COST, TREATMENT_PERIOD, CREATED_AT FROM RECORD WHERE USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}) R WHERE HM.DR_ID = R.DR_ID) A WHERE D.DEPT_ID = A.DEPT_ID ORDER BY A.CREATED_AT) T WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end}) WHERE RNUM >= #{begin}
